verbs.description: [ARG0: ABC News] [V: suspends] [ARG1: investigative reporter Brian Ross] [ARGM-CAU: for a " serious error " in his reporting about President Trump 's contact with Flynn regarding Russia] .
ABC News suspends investigative reporter Brian Ross for a " serious error " in his reporting about [ARG0: President Trump 's contact with Flynn] [V: regarding] [ARG1: Russia] .
